title: Prepare and Submit a Periodic Safety Update Report (PSUR)
description: A pharmacovigilance specialist must prepare and submit a PSUR to a regulatory authority.

tasks.description: Generate a line listing of all adverse event cases for the product within the reporting period from the safety database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully extracts all relevant case data for the specified time frame.

tasks.description: Analyze the case data to identify any new or changing safety signals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the data and notes an increase in reports of 'headache', but determines it does not constitute a new signal.

tasks.description: Draft the various sections of the PSUR using a template, incorporating the data and analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates the PSUR template with the required information.

tasks.description: Submit the final, approved PSUR to the health authority via their electronic gateway.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the report and receives a submission receipt.
